price: 223. Waxay dhigtaan dhegaha19, badankoodna waa beenlawyo.
footnotes: 19. Tani waxay ahayd ka hor inta aan arrinkaa laga mamnuucin shayaadiinta oo laga hor joogsan, sida ku soo aroortay Suuradda 72: Aayadaha 8-9.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
